name: UpdateCohortViews
description:
Update and track cohort file system views.

This tool updates the cohort's file system views, logging each GET request as a new view. It is useful for tracking how frequently a cohort is accessed.

parameters.name: cohort_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifier for the cohort.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this cohort.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you're trying to access. Obtain it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: cohort_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like id, name, description, and filters to update cohort views. Includes conditional logic such as filters and types for customization of cohort data update.

cohort_type.description:
Type of cohort based on filter complexity

* `static` - static
* `person_property` - person_property
* `behavioral` - behavioral
* `analytical` - analytical
